briefdescription.para: Change this to pass your own arguments to main functions.
board timer counter in timer interrupt

detaileddescription.para: Interrupt frequency is based on the defined BOARD_SYS_TIMER_HZ

briefdescription.para: Initialise bare-metal board timer and interrupt.

detaileddescription.para: This function is called in board_init, and it initializes the 1-MS timer interrupt for bare-metal mode

briefdescription.para: Update timer counter and other MS period operation in cycling interrupt and must be called periodically.
Get current timer's counter value in ticks.
Get current passed us since timer init.
Get current passed ms since timer init.
Get board timer counter in timer interrupt.

para.verbatim: this function needs a 1-MS timer interrupt to work. For bare-metal, it is implemented in this file. For OS, you must call \ref board_timer_update in the OS 1-MS timer interrupt when the bare-metal timer interrupt is not ready

parameterdescription.para: Enable or disable When this delay is enabled, use the OS delay function, if one is provided. See OSP_DELAY_OS_COMPAT_ENABLE and OSP_DELAY_OS_COMPAT_DISABLE
